profile_description:
Gucci Official
Under the creative direction of @alessandro_michele, Gucci redefines luxury with a contemporary approach to fashion.
on.gucci.com/Gucci2021

posts.description: Seen here in a still from #RidleyScott’s forthcoming @houseofguccimovie is protagonist @ladygaga wearing a long-sleeved dress with the GG monogram originating from the late 1960s and drawn from #Gucci’s archives by Oscar-winning costume designer #JantyYates. Discover more at link in bio. #LadyGaga #HouseOfGucci @ridleyscottcg @alessandro_michele #AlessandroMichele

Appearing in a series of portraits by ELLE, the Gucci Silver Jewelry collection includes styles that combine traditional motifs with a contemporary spirit. Discover the collection through link in bio. #GucciJewelry @elle_italia @elleuk #AlessandroMichele @alessandro_michele

ELLE presents the new #GucciJewelry collection of silver pieces in a series of portraits inspired by art of the Golden Age. The new lineup is defined by pieces enhanced by colored gems and enamel. Discover the collection through link in bio. @elle_italia @elleuk #AlessandroMichele @alessandro_michele

The new Gucci Silver Jewelry collection appears in a series of portraits, created in collaboration with ELLE, inspired by Renaissance and Flemish art. The Interlocking G motif defines necklaces, bracelets and rings made of silver chains. Photography by @carlottamanaigo, styling by @simonamelegari and art direction by @lucalanzoni_hearst. Discover the collection through link in bio. #GucciJewelry @elle_italia @elleuk #AlessandroMichele @alessandro_michele

“The Flora Gorgeous Gardenia campaign is a challenge to reinterpret the world of flowers in an unexpected way. The inspiration comes from @mileycyrus, an artist with a spirit that is both rock ‘n’ roll and eclectic at the same time… Because who says that someone with a rock ‘n’ roll attitude can’t live in a world of flowers and embody the Flora universe?” Creative Director @alessandro_michele on the new #FloraFantasy campaign. Discover more on @guccibeauty or through link in bio. #AlessandroMichele @alessandro_michele #MileyCyrus #GucciBeauty

Character Design/Storyboard: Terumi Nishii and NaSka
Animation Director: Akihiko Ota
Background: Kazuki Higashiji
Color: Hitomi Ikeda
Director of Photography: Tomoyuki Ishiyama
Animation Producer: Maki Terashima-Furuta (Production IG USA)
Animation Production: Akatsuki

First debuting on @guccibeauty: #FloraFantasy. In a fantastical world filled with flowers and fluffy animals, the new Gucci Flora Gorgeous Gardenia Eau de Parfum takes center stage as the perfect expression of @mileycyrus’ joy and a signature floral scent for all free spirits. The Eau de Parfum features a new silhouette in lacquered pink with the distinctive Flora pattern—created by artist and illustrator Vittorio Accornero for Gucci in 1966 and now reimagined in @alessandro_michele’s vision. Photography by @petrafcollins. Discover more through link in bio. #AlessandroMichele #MileyCyrus #GucciBeauty

American Humane monitored the animal action. No animals were harmed® (AH 10212)

@madamefigarochina’s July issue features NiNi @captainmiao wearing a #GucciOuverture look with #GucciEyewear sunglasses and the new #GucciDiana tote with bamboo handles. #NiNi is photographed by @yinchao_superstudio and styled by @bananafoggy. Discover more through link in bio. #AlessandroMichele @alessandro_michele #GucciEditorials

Spotted in Rome, @jodiesmith—the face of the new #GucciHighJewelry campaign—carried the new #GucciDiana tote bag—a House style from the ‘90s reimagined by @alessandro_michele with removable, neon leather belts, a nod to the functional bands that once came with the original bag to maintain the shape of the handles. #AlessandroMichele #JodieTurnerSmith
